citation.title: to be published

notes.text: As noted by Mikhail Mendelev, "This potential was specially developed to simulate the dislocation migration in γ (Al solution in Ni) and γ' (Ni<sub>3</sub>Al L1<sub>2</sub>) phases. The potential provides the correct description of the thermodynamics of these phases including melting temperatures and solubility regions. The potential also correctly reproduces the elastic properties and stacking fault energies of the γ' phase."
This file was provided by Mikhail Mendelev on September 21, 2022.
